alert.note: Alert for Phillips (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 8:29PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Phillips County through 915 PM CDT... At 829 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Long Island, or 16 miles northeast of Norton, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Long Island around 835 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Prairie View. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
